Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Requires the department of labor create and maintain a list of available careers and job openings for veterans in the state of New York
Summary: Requires the department of labor create and maintain a list of available careers and job openings for veterans in the state of New York and provide such list to the department of veterans' services; requires such list to be placed on the department of veterans' services website.
LawCode: Add ยง45, Lab L; amd ยง4, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the veterans' services law, in relation to requiring the department of labor to create and maintain a list of available careers and job listings in the state for veterans
